about_the_game:
Prepare for a chess experience like no other with the Orthographic Chess Sets, where art and strategy merge into a captivating visual puzzle. This unique collection offers 9 distinct chess designs, crafted from materials like metal, wood, and concrete, each featuring a dual-purpose visual twist. When viewed from above, the set appears flat, like an iconic 2D representation of a chessboard. But shift your perspective, and the pieces reveal their true form, transforming into fully realized 3D sculptures.

This optical trick challenges your perception of the game, blending traditional chess tactics with a dynamic visual experience. Each move engages not only your strategic thinking but also your sense of space and depth. Ideal for players who appreciate inventive design, the Orthographic Chess Sets redefine the chessboard, creating a new dimension of play.

A unique combination of functional chess set and artistic statement.
